bioghist.p: Sol. S. Jaffe (1920-2002) was an electrochemist who worked for Bright Star Industries in Clifton, New Jersey. He became a member of the Electrochemical Society in 1958.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of reprints and clippings of articles on classification and selection of batteries, a paper entitled "Primary and Secondary Galvanic Cells" on the history of batteries, brochures and technical data sheets from battery manufacturers. Companies from which Jaffe collected materials include the Edison Storage Battery Co., Leesona Moos Laboratories, Gould, Gulton Industries, Bright Star Industries, and Mallory Battery Company. Also included in the collection is a 1950 poster on the history of chemistry.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
